query.description: Use either "timestamp_eq" or "timestamp_between". Comma separated ISO 8601 format
Comma separated list of field names (default is "all")

request.description:
Returns a collection of weather history data for an OnPoint™ ID. Full documentation for this resource is found at the [Developer Portal](https://developer.weathersource.com/documentation/resources/get-points-onpoint_id-history/)

`{{onpoint_key}}` set as a environment variable in Postman. Get a free 30-day [developer key](https://developer.weathersource.com/#developer-account-sign-up).

`{{onpoint_id}}` a valid OnPoint ID. (example: `10724391`)

`{{format}}` the response. Allowed values: `json` and `csv`

This resource is **not** available to free 30-day developer plans ([History Postal Code](https://developer.weathersource.com/documentation/resources/get-postal_codes-postal_code_and_country-history/) is available). Please email <sales@weathersource.com> or call (844) 813-2617 if you need access to this resource.

query.description: Use either "timestamp_eq" or "timestamp_between". Comma separated ISO 8601 format
Comma separated list of field names (default is "all")
Use either "timestamp_eq" or "timestamp_between". Comma separated ISO 8601 format
Comma separated list of field names (default is "all")

request.description:
Returns a collection of weather history data for a latitude/longitude point. Full documentation for this resource is found at the [Developer Portal](https://developer.weathersource.com/documentation/resources/get-points-latitude_and_longitude-history/)

`{{onpoint_key}}` set as a environment variable in Postman. Get a free 30-day [developer key](https://developer.weathersource.com/#developer-account-sign-up).

`{{latitude}}` a valid latitude value between -90 and 90. (example: `38.8428`)

`{{longitude}}` a valid longitude value between -180 and 180. (example: `-77.0381`)

`{{format}}` the response. Allowed values: `json` and `csv`

This resource is **not** available to free 30-day developer plans ([History Postal Code](https://developer.weathersource.com/documentation/resources/get-postal_codes-postal_code_and_country-history/) is available). Please email <sales@weathersource.com> or call (844) 813-2617 if you need access to this resource.

Use either "timestamp_eq" or "timestamp_between". Comma separated ISO 8601 format
Comma separated list of field names (default is "all")

request.description:
Returns a collection of weather history data for a postal code. Full documentation for this resource is found at the [Developer Portal](https://developer.weathersource.com/documentation/resources/get-postal_codes-postal_code_and_country-history/)

`{{onpoint_key}}` set as a environment variable in Postman. Get a free 30-day [developer key](https://developer.weathersource.com/#developer-account-sign-up).

`{{postal_code}}` a valid postal code. Any spaces in the postal code must be URL encoded as `%20`. (example: `22222` or `X0A%200K0`)

`{{country}}` a valid [ISO 3166-1](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1) country code. (example: `us` or `ca`)

`{{format}}` the response. Allowed values: `json` and `csv`

This resource **is** available to free 30-day developer plans. For access to this resource for longer than 30 days, or for licensed use of the API in production environments, please email <sales@weathersource.com> or call (844) 813-2617.

This resource is **not** available to free 30-day developer plans ([History Postal Code](https://developer.weathersource.com/documentation/resources/get-postal_codes-postal_code_and_country-history/) is available). Please email <sales@weathersource.com> or call (844) 813-2617 if you need access to this resource.

request.description:
Returns metadata for a regional spatial file of weather history for the specified datatype. Full documentation for this resource is found at the [Developer Portal](https://developer.weathersource.com/documentation/resources/get-regions-region_id-history-datatype/)

`{{onpoint_key}}` set as a environment variable in Postman. Get a free 30-day [developer key](https://developer.weathersource.com/#developer-account-sign-up).

`{{region_id}}` Allowed: `global`

`{{datatype}}` A supported weather field. (example: `precip`)

This resource is **not** available to free 30-day developer plans ([History Postal Code](https://developer.weathersource.com/documentation/resources/get-postal_codes-postal_code_and_country-history/) is available). Please email <sales@weathersource.com> or call (844) 813-2617 if you need access to this resource.

Climatological data is **not** available to free 30-day developer plans. Please email <sales@weathersource.com> or call (844) 813-2617 if you need access to this resource.

`{{region_id}}` Allowed: `global`

Climatological data is **not** available to free 30-day developer plans. Please email <sales@weathersource.com> or call (844) 813-2617 if you need access to this resource.

request.description:
Returns a collection of astronomical data for a latitude/longitude point. Full documentation for this resource is found at the [Developer Portal](https://developer.weathersource.com/documentation/resources/get-points-latitude_and_longitude-astronomy/)

`{{onpoint_key}}` set as a environment variable in Postman. Get a free 30-day [developer key](https://developer.weathersource.com/#developer-account-sign-up).

`{{latitude}}` a valid latitude value between -90 and 90. (example: `38.8428`)

`{{longitude}}` a valid longitude value between -180 and 180. (example: `-77.0381`)

`{{format}}` the response. Allowed values: `json` and `csv`

This resource is **not** available to free 30-day developer plans ([Astronomy Postal Code](https://developer.weathersource.com/documentation/resources/get-postal_codes-postal_code_and_country-astronomy/) is available). Please email <sales@weathersource.com> or call (844) 813-2617 if you need access to this resource.

request.description:
Returns a collection of astronomical data for a postal code. Full documentation for this resource is found at the [Developer Portal](https://developer.weathersource.com/documentation/resources/get-postal_codes-postal_code_and_country-astronomy/)

`{{onpoint_key}}` set as a environment variable in Postman. Get a free 30-day [developer key](https://developer.weathersource.com/#developer-account-sign-up).

`{{postal_code}}` a valid postal code. Any spaces in the postal code must be URL encoded as `%20`. (example: `22222` or `X0A%200K0`)

`{{country}}` a valid [ISO 3166-1](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1) country code. (example: `us` or `ca`)

`{{format}}` the response. Allowed values: `json` and `csv`

This resource **is** available to free 30-day developer plans. For access to this resource for longer than 30 days, or for licensed use of the API in production environments, please email <sales@weathersource.com> or call (844) 813-2617.
